dcterms:creator: Li Liu
Thomas Hueber
Gang Feng
Denis Beautemps
dcterms:description: The CSF18 corpus consists of 238 French sentences that have been uttered twice. It includes 34 phonetic classes, with 14 vowels and 20 consonants encoded using 8 hand shapes and 5 hand positions. The phonetic transcription has been manually checked and corrected to match the CS keys encoded by the cuer.
dcterms:title: CSF18

dcterms:creator: Li Liu
Gang Feng
Denis Beautemps
dcterms:description: The CSF18V2 dataset is an updated version of the CSF18 corpus, which includes corrections to the phonetic transcription to better reflect the CS encoded keys. This version introduces 3 new phonetic classes and is intended to serve as a reference corpus for future studies.
dcterms:title: CSF18V2
